segments.text: Kobi Bryant and Shaquille O ’ Neal , they are the Los Angeles Lakers ’ star players .

segments.text: Wait a second . He shoots , he scores !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , Michael Jordan ’ s slam-dunks are beautiful things to watch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . He ’ s older , so he doesn ’ t slam , as much as he did when he was younger , but when he does , it ’ s still amazing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which team do you think will win ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Lakers . Jordan is the only good player Washington has .
